title: Face Check - My submission for the fanart contest!!
body:
http://33.media.tumblr.com/9ef21bce8d97a7b2dce8dcb4289a7ac8/tumblr_nc0a1jEvvX1qk32lpo1_1280.png

Face checked? Get rekt. Figured I'd toss my fanart contest submission up here! I decided to draw from personal experience and paint the terrifying experience of going to ward a camped bush all by yourself. Ahri and Wukong are probably rushing a poor defenseless Sona :C

Hope you guys like it!

replies.body: I like it and all, but it seems as if you spent more time on ahri's...ahem...*bonus features* than you did on wukongs face.  its still great, just sayin in case you wanna touch him up some more.
Those are some stunning bonus features, though.

I spent more time on ahri, period. I agree Wukong isn't as polished, this started out as just a painting of Ahri for a friend, and I found out about the contest a day and a half or so before the deadline so I didn't have much free time to put into him :C plan was to have him riding his nimbus cloud as well.
I actually like Wukong's face in this. Very nice work.

I would try and do this as well but I can't. I don't know how to do this type of coloring. I don't even have the software. Don't get me wrong, I'm getting there but my low self-esteem sees your picture and I lose a little hope. 

I like your picture. And Wukong looks so much more serious and laid back. And Ahri looks so perfect. I'm rooting for you.
Try using blender 3d, and rendering images, much easier than making a fan art from scratch.

That does sound easy but that sounds like it wouldn't be as cool or as hard as you'd worked on yours. I just want to get to that point or beyond one day where I can do something from scratch and make it look amazing.
Lol i am awesome u go die jajajajajajj u don't kno{{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} w
That's pretty good. Looking forward to the end of the contest results.
